name: Mathtopia
description:
A fun MATH puzzle game

Objective

Slide numbers and symbols to create you GOAL number

How to play
  • Use WASD or ←↑→↓ to move the PLAYER block and PUSH other symbols
  • The WORLD OPERATOR combines the equation of horizontal and vertical arrays.
  • You can use SPACE to skip level, but preferably solve the puzzle, it's more fun that way :)
  • Example:
1+5

-

3

If WORLD OPERATOR is 'x', then equivalent equation would be (1+5)x (5-3) = 12

The two equations are solved INDEPENDENTLY
